headline: HII Selected for U.S. Navy Training Contract to Enhance Readiness
summary: MCLEAN, Va., Aug. 20, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- HII (NYSE: HII) announced today that its Mission Technologies division is among the companies included on a multiple award contract to provide training products and services that will enhance U.S. Navy fleet readiness. The indefinite-delivery, indefinite-quantity (IDIQ) contract has a ceiling of $267 million and will enable HII to compete for task orders for the Naval Education and Training Professional Development Center, which supports professiona
